title: Account Band
body: My account was banned the other day "due to the use of malicious 3rd party programs or modifications to your League of Legends client."  the other day i talked to support about this problem, as i do not use any 3rd party programs except voice chats like Discord, that provide a gave overlay.  The tech support i talked to read there where some strange things with my account.  I was curious as to what those strange things are, and when i could get my account back?

replies.body: There's not a whole lot I can say about bans involving [**third party programs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848), other than the fact that our system looks for anything that could potentially alter or improve someone's gameplay. If you reach back out to us in that ticket, our player behavior agents should be able to give a little more context.
Cool i got my account back but thank you for your time.
